description: This file defines functions for managing and analyzing stock universe data, including reading symbol files, selecting symbols for specific indices, and computing top movers based on growth percentage within specified universes.

classes.name: AnalyzeGrowthRequest
classes.description: Request data structure for analyzing stock growth

classes.name: GrowthResult
classes.description: Result data structure for stock growth analysis

classes.name: PriceField
classes.description: Enumeration for price fields used in analysis

methods.name: List[str] _read_symbol_file(fname: str)
methods.description: Reads a list of stock symbols from a specified file within the symbols directory, removing comments and duplicates.

methods.name: List[str] get_universe_symbols(universe: str)
methods.description: Returns stock symbols for predefined stock indices like NASDAQ 100 and S&P 500, based on the provided universe name.

methods.name: Tuple[List[GrowthResult],List[str]] get_top_movers_universe( universe: str, start_date, end_date, limit: int, price_field: PriceField | None, client: FinanceClient, )
methods.description: Computes and retrieves the top stock movers within a specified universe over a date range, utilizing growth analysis.

ctags.name: get_top_movers_universe
ctags.signature: ( universe: str, start_date, end_date, limit: int, price_field: PriceField | None, client: FinanceClient, )
